original_title: First Flight of the White Raven
overview: ‘First Flight of the White Raven’ is a virtual release show experience filmed at Riksscenen in Norway. This is Wardruna’s most ambitious project to date, including brand new songs from the new album “Kvitravn”, Best-Of songs, breath-taking visuals and a brand-new way to experience music.
title: First Flight of the White Raven
